name: Timothy RAVENELL, Petitioner v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Ravenell v. Pa Dept. of Corrections

parties: Timothy RAVENELL, Petitioner v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of September, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
981 A.2d 1280
Timothy RAVENELL, Petitioner v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 122 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 15, 2009.
